trans-unit.source: Collects all errors generated by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: Samler inn alle feil som genereres av .NET Framework-dataleverandør for SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: This class is created by <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> to collect instances of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er opprettet ved <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>å samle inn forekomster av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError>klassen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>

trans-unit.source: SqlErrorCollection always contains at least one instance of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> class.
trans-unit.target: SqlErrorCollection inneholder alltid minst én forekomst av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError>klassen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError>

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref> collection into an <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Overfører av elementene i den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"> </xref> samling i en <xref:System.Array>, med Start fra den angitte indeksen.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> to copy elements into.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Array>å kopiere elementer til.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index from which to start copying into the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen som begynner å kopiere til den `array` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The sum of index and the number of elements in the collection is greater than the of the .
trans-unit.target: Summen av index og hvor mange elementer i den samlingen er større enn den for .

trans-unit.source: The array is .
trans-unit.target: The array is .

trans-unit.source: The index is not valid for array.
trans-unit.target: The index is not valid for array.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref> collection into a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Overfører av elementene i den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"> </xref> samlingen i et <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"> </xref>, med Start fra den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref> to copy the elements into.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"> </xref> å kopiere elementer i.

trans-unit.source: The index from which to start copying into the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen som begynner å kopiere til den `array` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The sum of index and the number of elements in the collection is greater than the length of the .
trans-unit.target: Summen av index og hvor mange elementer i den samlingen er større enn lengden på den .

trans-unit.source: The array is .
trans-unit.target: The array is .

trans-unit.source: The index is not valid for array.
trans-unit.target: The index is not valid for array.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of errors in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall feil i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The total number of errors in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall feil i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en opplisting som går gjennom den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in a collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeratorene kan brukes til å lese data i en samling, men de kan ikke brukes til å endre den underliggende samlingen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the error at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Henter feilen i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the error to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for feilen til å hente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError"></xref> that contains the error at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError"> </xref> som inneholder feil i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: Index parameter is outside array bounds.
trans-unit.target: Index-parameteren er utenfor grensene for matrise.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilgang til den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>er synkronisert (tråden trygt); ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som kan brukes til å synkronisere tilgang til <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
